signOutError: Could not complete the sign out procedure
signUpMailText: You received this message because your email address was provided when registering on the web site.
signUpMailNotice: If you did not complete the registration process and receive this message by mistake, please ignore it; no further action is required in this case.
passwordHelpText: Repeat account password twice to verify
signUpSuccess: The account registration process has been successfully started. In order to complete the registration process, please click on the link sent to the email address provided. Please note that the account activation link is valid for 24 hours, after this time you will need to sign up again.
restorePasswordDescription: Use the form below to restore a forgotten password. If the specified mailbox exists, a link will be sent to it to change the account password to the one you will specify.
restorePasswordSuccess: The procedure to change the password is successfully started. If you specified a valid mailbox, you will receive a link to change the password.
dataLoadingError: Error while loading data from server
accountFormHelp: To change your account information, use the form below. Please note that when you change your email address, you will be sent a link to activate your new address. If you enter a new password, you will need to log in to your account again.
displayNameHelpText: Shown instead of username when applicable
passwordNewHelpText: Repeat your password twice to verify
changeEmailModalText: The e-mail address change request has been successfully registered. To complete the procedure, please follow the instructions sent to the specified email address. Please note that the link in the email is valid for one hour.
